chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
isPR 4 (fun a _ _ _ : nat => a)

Premises:
isPR : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
pi1_3IsPR = let H : 2 < 3 := le_n 3 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 3 => extEqual 3 (evalPrimRec 3 p) (fun a _ _ : nat => a)) (projFunc 3 2 H) (fun c _ _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 3 (fun a _ _ : nat => a)
pi1_2IsPR = let H : 1 < 2 := le_n 2 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 2 => extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun a _ : nat => a)) (projFunc 2 1 H) (fun c _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 2 (fun a _ : nat => a)
pi2_3IsPR = let H : 1 < 3 := le_S 2 2 (le_n 2) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 3 => extEqual 3 (evalPrimRec 3 p) (fun _ b _ : nat => b)) (projFunc 3 1 H) (fun _ c0 _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 3 (fun _ b _ : nat => b)
pi3_3IsPR = let H : 0 < 3 := le_S 1 2 (le_S 1 1 (le_n 1)) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 3 => extEqual 3 (evalPrimRec 3 p) (fun _ _ c : nat => c)) (projFunc 3 0 H) (fun _ _ c1 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 3 (fun _ _ c : nat => c)
Init.Nat.shiftr = fun a : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => nat) a (fun _ : nat => Init.Nat.div2) : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => nat) n Arguments Init.Nat.shiftr (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.shiftl = fun a : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => nat) a (fun _ : nat => Init.Nat.double) : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => nat) n Arguments Init.Nat.shiftl (_ _)%nat_scope
pi2_2IsPR = let H : 0 < 2 := le_S 1 1 (le_n 1) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 2 => extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun _ b : nat => b)) (projFunc 2 0 H) (fun _ c0 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 2 (fun _ b : nat => b)
const1_NIsPR : forall n : nat, isPR 1 (fun _ : nat => n)
BinNatDef.N.shiftl_nat = fun a : BinNums.N => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => BinNums.N) a (fun _ : nat => BinNatDef.N.double) : BinNums.N -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => BinNums.N) n Arguments BinNatDef.N.shiftl_nat _%N_scope _%nat_scope
Nat.log2_up_wd = let H : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq)) Nat.compare := fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => match Nat.compare_spec x x0 in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (c = (y ?= y0)) with | @CompEq _ _ _ x1 => match Nat.compare_spec y y0 in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (x = x0 -> Eq = c) with | @CompEq _ _ _ _ => fun _ : x = x0 => eq_refl | @CompLt _ _ _ H1 => fun H2 : x = x0 => False_ind (Eq = Lt) ((fun H3 : x0 = y => (fun H4 : y = y0 => (fun H5 : y0 < y0 => Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.lt_irrefl H5) (Nat.Private...
Ndigits.Bv2N = fix Bv2N (n : nat) (bv : Bvector.Bvector n) {struct bv} : BinNums.N := match bv with | @Vector.nil _ => BinNums.N0 | @Vector.cons _ true n0 bv0 => BinNat.N.succ_double (Bv2N n0 bv0) | @Vector.cons _ false n0 bv0 => BinNat.N.double (Bv2N n0 bv0) end : forall n : nat, Bvector.Bvector n -> BinNums.N Arguments Ndigits.Bv2N {n}%nat_scope, _ _
Inductive ascii : Set := Ascii : bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> Ascii.ascii Arguments Ascii.Ascii (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%bool_scope
Nat.log2_up = fun a : nat => match 1 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.log2 (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.log2_up _%nat_scope
Nat.sqrt_up = fun a : nat => match 0 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.sqrt (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.sqrt_up _%nat_scope
Init.Nat.div2 = fix div2 (n : nat) : nat := match n with | S (S n') => S (div2 n') | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.div2 _%nat_scope
idIsPR = let H : 0 < 1 := le_n 1 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 1 => extEqual 1 (evalPrimRec 1 p) (fun x : nat => x)) (projFunc 1 0 H) (fun c : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 1 (fun x : nat => x)
succIsPR = exist (fun p : PrimRec 1 => extEqual 1 (evalPrimRec 1 p) S) succFunc (fun c : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 1 S
Init.Nat.eqb = fix eqb (n m : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => match m with | 0 => true | S _ => false end | S n' => match m with | 0 => false | S m' => eqb n' m' end end : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments Init.Nat.eqb (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.compare = fix compare (n m : nat) {struct n} : comparison := match n with | 0 => match m with | 0 => Eq | S _ => Lt end | S n' => match m with | 0 => Gt | S m' => compare n' m' end end : nat -> nat -> comparison Arguments Init.Nat.compare (_ _)%nat_scope
Ascii.shift = fun (c : bool) (a : Ascii.ascii) => match a with | Ascii.Ascii a1 a2 a3 a4 a5 a6 a7 _ => Ascii.Ascii c a1 a2 a3 a4 a5 a6 a7 end : bool -> Ascii.ascii -> Ascii.ascii Arguments Ascii.shift _%bool_scope _%char_scope
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
ByteVector.to_Bvector = fix to_Bvector (n : nat) (v : ByteVector.ByteVector n) {struct v} : Bvector.Bvector (n * 8) := match v in (Vector.t _ n0) return (Bvector.Bvector (n0 * 8)) with | @Vector.nil _ => Vector.nil bool | @Vector.cons _ (Ascii.Ascii b0 b1 b2 b3 b4 b5 b6 b7) n0 v' => Vector.cons bool b0 (S (S (S (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8)))))))) (Vector.cons bool b1 (S (S (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8))))))) (Vector.cons bool b2 (S (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8)))))) (Vector.cons bool b3 (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8))))) (Vector.cons bool b4 (S (S (S (n0 * 8)))) (Vector...
BinNatDef.N.compare = fun n m : BinNums.N => match n with | BinNums.N0 => match m with | BinNums.N0 => Eq | BinNums.Npos _ => Lt end | BinNums.Npos n' => match m with | BinNums.N0 => Gt | BinNums.Npos m' => BinPos.Pos.compare n' m' end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> comparison Arguments BinNatDef.N.compare (_ _)%N_scope
Init.Nat.ldiff = fun a b : nat => Init.Nat.bitwise (fun b0 b' : bool => b0 && negb b') a a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.ldiff (_ _)%nat_scope
Ascii.nat_of_ascii = fun a : Ascii.ascii => BinNat.N.to_nat (Ascii.N_of_ascii a) : Ascii.ascii -> nat Arguments Ascii.nat_of_ascii _%char_scope
Init.Nat.testbit = fix testbit (a n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => Init.Nat.odd a | S n0 => testbit (Init.Nat.div2 a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments Init.Nat.testbit (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.log2_double : forall a : nat, 0 < a -> Nat.log2 (2 * a) = S (Nat.log2 a)
Nat.log2_up_double : forall a : nat, 0 < a -> Nat.log2_up (2 * a) = S (Nat.log2_up a)
VectorDef.shiftrepeat = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.rectS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n))) (fun h : A => VectorDef.cons A h 1 (VectorDef.cons A h 0 (VectorDef.nil A))) (fun (h : A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)) (H : (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n0))) n v) => VectorDef.cons A h (S (S n)) H) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n0))) n v Arguments VectorDef.shiftrepeat {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
Nat.log2_eq_succ_is_pow2 : forall a : nat, Nat.log2 (S a) = S (Nat.log2 a) -> exists b : nat, S a = 2 ^ b
